name: Eventer4splunk 1.3.0
tagline: Eventer4Splunk is a .net library to simplify log writing for Splunk TM
body:
Eventer4Splunk is a lightweight c# library aimed to ease writing logs in the Splunk (http://www.splunk.com) format.

###Features:

* Generate Splunk formatted logs
* Support all version of Splunk
* Easily send logs to a TCP/UDP Data Input
* Factory based event generator
* Memory queue for faster generation
* Support transaction
* Available as a Nuget Package : https://www.nuget.org/packages/Eventer4Splunk/

###Contact and Feedbacks

To contact the team send your message to dotnetfever[at]gmail.com
